metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48065 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
GNU Binutils before 2.40 was discovered to contain a memory leakvulnerability var the function find_abstract_instance in dwarf2.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48065` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-arc-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-common - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-for-build - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-for-host - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-multiarch - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-source - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.41-5ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.41-5ubuntu1
libbinutils - 2.41-5ubuntu1
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.41-5ubuntu1
libctf0 - 2.41-5ubuntu1
libgprofng0 - 2.41-5ubuntu1
libsframe1 - 2.41-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.41-5ubuntu1').
